title: Workout Tracker
description: A real-time pose detection app that counts fitness exercises using OpenCV and MediaPipe.

title: MarketPulse
description: Hackathon-winning stock sentiment tool powered by NLP and financial data.

title: Speech Coach
description: An automated coach that analyzes articulation and pacing for speech practice.

title: Recipe Recommender
description: A personalized recipe engine using cosine similarity and ingredient embeddings.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This very website. A clean, SvelteKit-based interactive showcase of my projects.

title: Data Engineering API
description: Forecasts sales with ARIMA and STL models, integrated via REST API.

title: PDF Classifier
description: Classifies educational PDFs using BERT+RNN based on font features and token sequences.

title: Language Learning App
description: A mobile app that teaches vocabulary using spaced repetition and voice input.

title: Immigrant Worker Report
description: Empirical research on immigrant labor in the US, analyzing trends and stories.

title: Expense Splitter
description: A JS tool that calculates who owes whom in group expenses with a clean UI.

title: Pop Culture Matcher
description: Matches real-time webcam faces with celebrity lookalikes using facial embeddings.

title: Dance Pose Analyzer
description: Replicates MJ-style dancing using stick-figure guidance and pose comparison.
